title: BIP 39: bBADGER/ETH & bDIGG/ETH Sushi Pool
body:
TLDR; To further add utility for bBADGER and bDIGG we would like to propose using a portion of the bDIGG, bBADGER, and ETH that the treasury holds on seeding bBADGER/ETH & bDIGG/ETH pools on sushiswap.fi 2 The immediate use cases of this would be to further integrate bDIGG and bBADGER into DeFi protocols like Unit Protocol (Unit.xyz), a decentralized protocol that allows you to mint stablecoin $USDP using a variety of tokens as collateral. These pools would let the price oracles for these platforms measure bBadger and bDigg, a necessary step for Unit Protocol integration.

See Discussions: https://forum.badger.finance/t/bip-39-bbadger-eth-bdigg-eth-sushi-pool-proposal/3493
author: 0xa001B5639e4ed26dF58367016eB08850e3e55655
